Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Futhi khumbula lilalela iNkosi yalo futhi kufanele likwenze lokho
Futhi khumbula (umhlaba) ukhipha konke okuphakathi kuwona usale ungenalutho
Futhi ulalela iNkosi yawo futhi kufanele ukwenze lokho
Oh muntu! Ngempela wena usebenzele iNkosi yakho ukusebenza okuphelele ekugcineni uzohlangana nayo
Mayelana nalowo onikezwa incwadi yakhe (yezenzo zakhe) esandleni sakhe sokunene
Kepha lowo onikezwe incwadi yakhe (yezenzo zakhe) ngemumva komhlane wakhe
Ngempela yena wayephakathi kwabantu bakhe (bakubo) ejabulile
Ngempela yena wayecabanga ukuthi angeke aphindele (kuMvelinqangi)
Yebo!	Ngempela	iNkosi	yakhe	ngasosonke	isikhathi yayimbona
Kepha lutho! Ngifunga ngobubomvu bokushona kwelanga
Futhi ngifunga nangobusuku kanye nalokho okwenza ukuthi kubemnyama
Ngakho-ke kwenzenjani ngabo ukuthi bangakholwa na
Futhi uma befundelwa iQur’an abajabalali (abakhothami kuMvelinqangi)
Futhi uMvelinqangi wazi kakhulu ngalokho abakugcina ngaphakathi kubona
Ngaphandle kwalabo abakholwayo futhi abenza izenzo ezilungileyo okwabo ngumvuzo ongasoze wanqamuka
Futhi	ngifunga	ngesibhakabhaka	esibambe	izinkanyezi ezinkulu
Futhi abazange babahluphe ngaphandle kokuthi abakholelwe kuMvelinqangi ophakeme ngamandla odunyiswayo
Lowo okungowakhe umbuso wamazulu nomhlaba futhi uMvelinqangi ungobonwayo (ongufakazi) phezulu kwezinto zonke
Ngempela labo abalinga abakholwayo besilisa nabakholwayo besifazane bese bengazisoli (kuMvelinqangi) ngakho-ke okwabo yisijeziso sesihogo futhi okwabo yisijeziso somlilo ovuthayo
Ngempela labo abakholwayo futhi abenza izenzo ezilungileyo okwabo yizivande okugeleza ngaphansi kwazo imifula, lokho yimpumelelo enkulu
Ngakube yafika yini indaba yamabutho empi
Futhi yini ekwenza wazi ukuthi yini okukhanyayo ebusuku
Awukho umphefumulo kepha phezu kwawo kunomlondolozi
Ngakho-ke akabheke umuntu ukuthi wadalwa ngani
Ngifunga ngakho-ke angeke abenawo amandla nomsizi
Futhi ngifunga ngezulu (ngesibhakabhaka) esiletha imvula ngokuphindelela
Futhi ngifunga ngomhlaba ngenkathi uqhekeka phakathi
Ngakho-ke	banike	ithuba	abangakholwa,	bayekwe okwesikhashana ngobumnene
